00028 #include "Triples.h"

00030 
00031 void 
00032 Triples::insert(unsigned int subject, unsigned int predicate, unsigned int object)
00033 {   
00034     if( (subject==-1) || (predicate==-1) || (object==-1) ) {
00035         return;
00036     }
00037     
00038     if (parsing <= SOP)
00039     {
00040         graph[ntriples].x = subject;
00041     }
00042     else if (parsing <= POS)
00043     {
00044         graph[ntriples].x = predicate;
00045     }
00046     else
00047     {
00048         graph[ntriples].x = object;
00049     }
00050     
00051     if ((parsing == PSO) || (parsing == OSP))
00052     {
00053         graph[ntriples].y = subject;
00054     }
00055     else if ((parsing == SPO) || (parsing == OPS))
00056     {
00057         graph[ntriples].y = predicate;
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         graph[ntriples].y = object;
00062     }
00063     
00064     if ((parsing == POS) || (parsing == OPS))
00065     {
00066         graph[ntriples].z = subject;
00067     }
00068     else if ((parsing == SOP) || (parsing == OSP))
00069     {
00070         graph[ntriples].z = predicate;
00071     }
00072     else
00073     {
00074         graph[ntriples].z = object;
00075     }
00076     
00077     ntriples++;
00078 }
00079 
00080 TripleID
00081 Triples::retrieveTriple(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
00082 {
00083     TripleID triple;
00084     
00085     if (parsing <= SOP)
00086     {
00087         triple.x = x;
00088     }
00089     else if (parsing <= POS)
00090     {
00091         triple.y = x;
00092     }
00093     else
00094     {
00095         triple.z = x;
00096     }
00097         
00098     if ((parsing == PSO) || (parsing == OSP))
00099     {
00100             triple.x = y;
00101     }
00102     else if ((parsing == SPO) || (parsing == OPS))
00103     {
00104         triple.y = y;
00105     }
00106     else
00107     {
00108         triple.z = y;
00109     }
00110         
00111     if ((parsing == POS) || (parsing == OPS))
00112     {
00113         triple.x = z;
00114     }
00115     else if ((parsing == SOP) || (parsing == OSP))
00116     {
00117         triple.y = z;
00118     }
00119     else
00120     {
00121         triple.z = z;
00122     }
00123     
00124     return triple;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void
00128 Triples::clustering()
00129 {
00130     dictionary->beginClustering();
00131     
00132     unsigned int new_shared, new_subject, new_object;
00133     new_shared = 1;
00134     new_subject = dictionary->getSsubobj() + 1;
00135     
00136     if (dictionary->getMapping() == MAPPING1) new_object = dictionary->getNsubjects() + 1;
00137     else new_object = dictionary->getSsubobj() + 1;
00138     
00139     bool repeated = false;
00140     unsigned int x = 0, y = 0, z = 0;
00141     TripleID previous;
00142 
00143     for (unsigned int i=0; i<ntriples; i++)
00144     {       
00145         if (x == graph[i].x)
00146         {
00147             if (y == graph[i].y)
00148             {
00149                 if (z == graph[i].z)
00150                 {
00151                     repeated = true;
00152                     
00153                     graph[i].x = previous.x; 
00154                     graph[i].y = previous.y; 
00155                     graph[i].z = previous.z;
00156                 }
00157                 else
00158                 {
00159                     z = graph[i].z;
00160                 }
00161                 
00162                 graph[i].y = previous.y;
00163             }
00164             else
00165             {
00166                 y = graph[i].y;
00167                 z = graph[i].z;
00168                 
00169                 // Subject change: ckeck if it clusterized
00170                 unsigned int new_id = dictionary->isClusterized(graph[i].y, VOC_SUBJECT);
00171                 
00172                 if (new_id == 0)
00173                 {
00174                     // It is not previously clusterized
00175                     if (graph[i].y <= dictionary->getSsubobj())
00176                     {
00177                         dictionary->updateID(graph[i].y, new_shared, VOC_SUBJECT);                      
00178                         graph[i].y = new_shared;
00179                         new_shared++;
00180                     }
00181                     else
00182                     {               
00183                         dictionary->updateID(graph[i].y, new_subject, VOC_SUBJECT);
00184                         graph[i].y = new_subject;
00185                         new_subject++;
00186                     }
00187                 }
00188                 else
00189                 {
00190                     graph[i].y = new_id;
00191                 }
00192             }
00193         }
00194         else
00195         {           
00196             x = graph[i].x;
00197             y = graph[i].y;
00198             z = graph[i].z;
00199 
00200             // Subject change: ckeck if it clusterized
00201             unsigned int new_id = dictionary->isClusterized(graph[i].y, VOC_SUBJECT);
00202             
00203             if (new_id == 0)
00204             {
00205                 if (graph[i].y <= dictionary->getSsubobj())
00206                 {
00207                     dictionary->updateID(graph[i].y, new_shared, VOC_SUBJECT);
00208                     graph[i].y = new_shared;
00209                     new_shared++;
00210                 }
00211                 else
00212                 {
00213                     dictionary->updateID(graph[i].y, new_subject, VOC_SUBJECT);
00214                     graph[i].y = new_subject;
00215                     new_subject++;
00216                 }
00217             }
00218             else
00219             {
00220                 graph[i].y = new_id;
00221             }
00222         }
00223         
00224         if (repeated == false)
00225         {       
00226             // Object change: check if it clusterized
00227             unsigned int new_id = dictionary->isClusterized(graph[i].z, VOC_OBJECT);
00228             
00229             if (new_id == 0)
00230             {
00231                 if (graph[i].z <= dictionary->getSsubobj())
00232                 {
00233                     dictionary->updateID(graph[i].z, new_shared, VOC_OBJECT);
00234                     graph[i].z = new_shared;
00235                     new_shared++;
00236                 }
00237                 else
00238                 {
00239                     dictionary->updateID(graph[i].z, new_object, VOC_OBJECT);
00240                     graph[i].z = new_object;
00241                     new_object++;
00242                 }
00243             }
00244             else
00245             {
00246                 graph[i].z = new_id;
00247             }
00248         }
00249         else
00250         {
00251              repeated = false;
00252         }
00253 
00254         previous = graph[i];
00255     }
00256         
00257     dictionary->endClustering();
00258 }

00262 //#define findDest(data, max1, max2) (data)

00264 #define setMax(x,y) ( x = (x>y) ? (x) : (y) )
00265 #define setMin(x,y) ( x = (x<y) ? (x) : (y) )

00269 void
00270 Triples::gnuplot(unsigned int npredicates, vector <string> predicates, unsigned int max, string path)
00271 {
00272     char *xstring = new char[16];
00273 
00274     FILE *data = NULL;
00275     
00276     // All Predicates
00277     string filename(path);  
00278     filename.append("all.gnu");
00279 
00280     gnuplotHeader(1, npredicates, predicates[0], 1, max, 1, max, filename);
00281     
00282     unsigned int ymin = max, ymax = 0, zmin = max, zmax = 0;
00283     unsigned int x = 0, y = 0, z = 0;
00284     unsigned int added=0,discarded=0;
00285     
00286     for (unsigned int i=0; i<ntriples; i++)
00287     {       
00288         if (x != graph[i].x)
00289         {
00290             if (x != 0)
00291             {
00292                 // Predicate finished
00293                 fclose(data);
00294                 
00295                 filename = path;
00296                 sprintf(xstring,"%d", x);
00297                 filename.append(xstring);
00298                 filename.append(".gnu");
00299                 
00300                 // Print Gnuplot Header for the global-squared matrix
00301                 gnuplotHeader(x, 1, predicates[x], 1, max, 1, max, (char*)filename.c_str());
00302                 
00303                 // Print Gnuplot Header for the local-adjusted matrix
00304                 filename.replace(path.length(), filename.length(), xstring);
00305                 filename.append("b.gnu"); 
00306                 gnuplotHeader(x, 1, predicates[x], ymin-2, ymax+2, zmin-2, zmax+2, (char*)filename.c_str());
00307             }
00308             
00309             // Processing a new predicate
00310             ymin = max, ymax = 0, zmin = max, zmax = 0;
00311             
00312             x = graph[i].x;
00313             
00314             // Opening data file for this predicate
00315             filename = path;
00316             sprintf(xstring,"%d",x);
00317             filename.append(xstring);
00318             filename.append(".dat");
00319             data = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
00320         }
00321         
00322         unsigned int newy = findDest(graph[i].y, MAX_ITEMS, max);
00323         unsigned int newz = findDest(graph[i].z, MAX_ITEMS, max);
00324         
00325         if( (newy!=y) || (newz!=z) ) {
00326             added++;
00327             //cout << "Subject: " << graph[i].y << " => " << newy << endl;
00328             //cout << "Object: " << graph[i].z << " => " << newz << endl;
00329             
00330             y = newy;
00331             z = newz;
00332             
00333             if (parsing == PSO)
00334                 fprintf(data, "%d %d\n", graph[i].z, graph[i].y);
00335             else
00336                 fprintf(data, "%d %d\n", graph[i].y, graph[i].z);
00337 
00338             setMin(ymin, graph[i].y);
00339             setMax(ymax, graph[i].y);
00340             setMin(zmin, graph[i].z);
00341             setMax(zmax, graph[i].z);
00342         } else
00343         {
00344             discarded++;
00345             //cout << "\tSubject: " << graph[i].y << " => " << newy << endl;
00346             //cout << "\tObject: " << graph[i].z << " => " << newz << endl;
00347         }
00348     }
00349     
00350     cout << "Added: "<< added << endl;
00351     cout << "Discarded: "<< discarded << endl;
00352     
00353     // Last predicate
00354     fclose(data);
00355             
00356     filename = path;
00357     sprintf(xstring,"%d", x);
00358     filename.append(xstring);
00359     filename.append(".gnu");
00360     gnuplotHeader(x, 1, predicates[x], 1, max, 1, max, (char*)filename.c_str());
00361             
00362     filename.replace(path.length(), filename.length(), xstring);
00363     filename.append("b.gnu"); 
00364     gnuplotHeader(x, 1, predicates[x], ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax, (char*)filename.c_str());
00365     
00366     delete[] xstring;
00367 }
00368 
00369 #else
00370 
00371 #define findDest(data, max1, max2) ( ((((double)data)*max1)/max2) )
00372 //#define findDest(data, max1, max2) (data)
00373 
00374 #define findSrc(data,max1,max2) (unsigned int)((((double)data)*max2)/max1)
00375 
00376 #define setMax(x,y) ( x = (x>y) ? (x) : (y) )
00377 #define setMin(x,y) ( x = (x<y) ? (x) : (y) )
00378 
00379 #define MAX_ITEM 1000
00380 
00381 void
00382 Triples::gnuplot(unsigned int npredicates, vector <string> predicates, unsigned int max, string path)
00383 {
00384     //std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > > data;
00385     cout << "max: " << max << endl;
00386 
00387     char *xstring = new char[16];
00388     
00389     FILE *data = NULL;
00390     
00391     // All Predicates
00392     string filename(path);  
00393     filename.append("all.gnu");
00394     
00395     gnuplotHeader(1, npredicates, predicates[0], 1, max, 1, max, filename);
00396     
00397     unsigned int size = MAX_ITEM*MAX_ITEM;
00398     unsigned char *dataMatrix = new unsigned char[size];
00399     
00400     unsigned int x=0;
00401     unsigned int ymin = max, ymax = 0, zmin = max, zmax = 0;
00402         
00403     for(int i=0;i<size;i++) {
00404         dataMatrix[i]=0;
00405     }
00406     
00407     for (unsigned int i=0; i<ntriples; i++)
00408     {               
00409         if(x!=graph[i].x) {
00410             if(x!=0) {
00411                 //cout << "End predicate" << endl;
00412                 
00413                 // Opening data file for this predicate
00414                 filename = path;
00415                 sprintf(xstring,"%d",x);
00416                 filename.append(xstring);
00417                 filename.append(".dat");
00418                 data = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
00419                 
00420                 for(int i=0;i<MAX_ITEM;i++) {
00421                     for(int j=0;j<MAX_ITEM;j++) {
00422                         unsigned char item = dataMatrix[(i*MAX_ITEM)+j];
00423 //                      cout << item << " ";
00424                         
00425                         if(item>0) {
00426                             int y = findSrc(i, MAX_ITEM, max);
00427                             int z = findSrc(j, MAX_ITEM, max);
00428                             
00429                             if (parsing == PSO)
00430                                 fprintf(data, "%d %d\n", z, y);
00431                             else
00432                                 fprintf(data, "%d %d\n", y, z);
00433                         }
00434                         
00435                         dataMatrix[(i*MAX_ITEM)+j] = 0;
00436                     }
00437 //                  cout << endl;
00438                 }
00439                 
00440                 // Predicate finished
00441                 fclose(data);
00442                 
00443                 // Creating GnuPlot
00444                 filename = path;
00445                 sprintf(xstring,"%d", x);
00446                 filename.append(xstring);
00447                 filename.append(".gnu");
00448                 
00449                 // Print Gnuplot Header for the global-squared matrix
00450                 gnuplotHeader(x, 1, predicates[x], 1, max, 1, max, (char*)filename.c_str());
00451                 
00452                 // Print Gnuplot Header for the local-adjusted matrix
00453                 filename.replace(path.length(), filename.length(), xstring);
00454                 filename.append("b.gnu"); 
00455                 gnuplotHeader(x, 1, predicates[x], ymin-2, ymax+2, zmin-2, zmax+2, (char*)filename.c_str());
00456             }
00457             
00458             x = graph[i].x;
00459             
00460             //cout << "New predicate: " << x << endl;
00461             
00462             // Processing a new predicate
00463             ymin = max, ymax = 0, zmin = max, zmax = 0;
00464         }
00465 
00466         unsigned int newy = findDest(graph[i].y, MAX_ITEM, max);
00467         unsigned int newz = findDest(graph[i].z, MAX_ITEM, max);
00468 
00469         //cout << "Subject: " << graph[i].y << " => " << newy << " => " << findSrc(newy, MAX_ITEM, max)<< endl;
00470         //cout << "Object: " << graph[i].z << " => " << newz << " => " << findSrc(newz, MAX_ITEM, max)<< endl;
00471         
00472         dataMatrix[(newy*MAX_ITEM)+newz]=1;
00473         
00474         setMin(ymin, graph[i].y);
00475         setMax(ymax, graph[i].y);
00476         setMin(zmin, graph[i].z);
00477         setMax(zmax, graph[i].z);
00478     }
00479     
00480     cout << "End predicate " << endl;
00481 }
00482 #endif
00483 
00484 void 
00485 Triples::graphSort()
00486 {
00487     graph.resize(ntriples);
00488     sort(graph.begin(),graph.end(), Triples::sortXYZ);
00489 }
00490 
00491 unsigned int 
00492 Triples::size()
00493 {
00494     return ntriples;
00495 }
00496 
00497 void
00498 Triples::gnuplotHeader(unsigned int firstP, unsigned int sizeP, string predicate, 
00499                        unsigned int xmin, unsigned int xmax, unsigned int ymin, unsigned int ymax, string filename)
00500 {   
00501     FILE *header = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
00502     
00503     fprintf(header, "set terminal png size 1024,768\n");
00504     fprintf(header, "set pointsize 0.35\n");
00505     fprintf(header, "#set logscale\n");
00506     fprintf(header, "set output \"%s.png\"\n", filename.c_str());
00507     fprintf(header, "set xlabel \"Objects\"\n");
00508     fprintf(header, "set ylabel \"Subjects\"\n");
00509     
00510     if (parsing == PSO)
00511     {
00512         fprintf(header, "set xrange [%d:%d]\n", ymin, ymax);
00513         fprintf(header, "set yrange [%d:%d]\n", xmin, xmax);
00514     }
00515     else
00516     {
00517         fprintf(header, "set xrange [%d:%d]\n", xmin, xmax);
00518         fprintf(header, "set yrange [%d:%d]\n", ymin, ymax);        
00519     }
00520     
00521     if (sizeP > 1)
00522     {   
00523         fprintf(header, "plot \"1.dat\" notitle pt 7, \\\n");
00524         
00525         for (unsigned int i=2; i<=sizeP-1; i++)
00526             fprintf(header, "\"%d.dat\" notitle pt 7, \\\n", i);
00527             
00528         fprintf(header, "\"%d.dat\" notitle pt 7\n", sizeP);
00529     }
00530     else
00531     {
00532         fprintf(header, "plot \"%d.dat\" title \"%s\"\n", firstP, predicate.c_str());
00533     }
00534     
00535     fclose(header);
00536 }
00537 
00538 inline void swap(char &a, char &b) {
00539     unsigned int tmp;
00540     
00541     tmp = a;
00542     a = b;
00543     b = tmp;
00544 }
00545 
00546 inline void swap(unsigned int &a, unsigned int &b) {
00547     unsigned int tmp;
00548     
00549     tmp = a;
00550     a = b;
00551     b = tmp;
00552 }
00553 
00554 /*
00555  SRC
00556  v
00557       SPO  SOP  PSO  POS  OSP  OPS   <DEST
00558  SPO       yz   xy   xyz2 xyz1 xz
00559  SOP  yz        xyz1 xz   xy   xyz2
00560  PSO  xy   xyz2      yz   xz   xyz1
00561  POS  xyz1 xz   yz        xyz2
00562  OSP  xyz2 xy   xz   xyz1      yz   
00563  OPS  xz   xyz1 xyz2 xy   yz
00564  
00565  SWAP:
00566  xy   12
00567  xz   13
00568  yz   23
00569  xyz1 12 13
00570  xyz2 12 23
00571  */
00572 
00573 // swap 1-2 
00574 //xy xyz1 xyz2
00575 bool swap1tab[6][6] = { { 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0 }, 
00576                         { 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 1 },
00577                         { 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1 },
00578                         { 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0 },
00579                         { 1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0 },
00580                         { 0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0 }};
00581 
00582 // swap 1-3
00583 // xz xyz1
00584 bool swap2tab[6][6] = { { 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1 },
00585                         { 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0 },
00586                         { 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1 },
00587                         { 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0 },
00588                         { 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0 },
00589                         { 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0 }};
00590 
00591 // swap 2-3
00592 // yz xyz2
00593 bool swap3tab[6][6] = { { 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0},
00594                         { 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1},
00595                         { 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0},
00596                         { 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0},
00597                         { 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1},
00598                         { 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0}};           
00599 
00600 
00601 void
00602 Triples::convertParsing(unsigned int to) {
00603     
00604     if(parsing==to) 
00605         return;
00606     
00607     bool swap1 = swap1tab[parsing-1][to-1];
00608     bool swap2 = swap2tab[parsing-1][to-1];
00609     bool swap3 = swap3tab[parsing-1][to-1];
00610     
00611 #if 0
00612     char str[4];
00613     strcpy(str, parsingTypeStr[parsing]);
00614     
00615     cout << "Convert from " << parsingTypeStr[parsing] << " to " << parsingTypeStr[to] << endl;
00616     
00617     if(swap1) {
00618         swap(str[0], str[1]);
00619         cout << "\tSwap x y" << endl;
00620     }
00621     
00622     if(swap2) {
00623         swap(str[0], str[2]);
00624         cout << "\tSwap x z" << endl;
00625     }
00626     
00627     if(swap3) {
00628         swap(str[1], str[2]);
00629         cout << "\tSwap y z" << endl;
00630     }
00631     cout << "Result: "<< str << endl;
00632 #endif  
00633 
00634     for(int i=0; i<ntriples;i++) {
00635         if(swap1){
00636             swap(graph[i].x, graph[i].y);
00637         }
00638         
00639         if(swap2) {
00640             swap(graph[i].x, graph[i].z);
00641         }
00642         
00643         if(swap3){
00644             swap(graph[i].y, graph[i].z);
00645         }
00646     }
00647     parsing = to;
00648     graphSort();
00649 }
00650 
00651 void 
00652 Triples::calculateDegree(string path) {
00653     const int maxval = 50000;
00654     const int nbins = 50000;
00655     
00656     Histogram hDegree(0, maxval, nbins);
00657     Histogram hDegreePartial(0, maxval, nbins);
00658     Histogram hDegreeLabeled(0, maxval, nbins);
00659     
00660     int xcount=1,ycount=1,ychanged=1;
00661     
00662     int x=graph[0].x;
00663     int y=graph[0].y;
00664     int z=graph[0].z;   
00665     
00666     //cout << graph[0].x << " " << graph[0].y << " " << graph[0].z << endl; 
00667     
00668     for (int i=1; i<ntriples; i++) {
00669         
00670         // Ignore duplicate triples
00671         if( (x==graph[i].x) && (y==graph[i].y) && (z==graph[i].z) ) {
00672             continue;
00673         }
00674         
00675         if (x != graph[i].x) {
00676             //cout << "\tdegree: " << xcount <<endl;
00677             hDegree.Add(xcount);
00678             
00679             //cout << "\tpartial degree: " << ycount << endl;
00680             hDegreePartial.Add(ycount);
00681             
00682             //cout << "\tlabeled degree: " << ychanged << endl;
00683             hDegreeLabeled.Add(ychanged);
00684             
00685             xcount=ycount=1;
00686             ychanged=1;
00687         } else {
00688             xcount++;
00689             
00690             if (y != graph[i].y) {
00691                 ychanged++;
00692                 
00693                 //cout << "\tpartial degree: " << ycount << endl;
00694                 hDegreePartial.Add(ycount);;
00695                 
00696                 ycount=1;
00697             } else {
00698                 ycount++;
00699             }
00700         }
00701         
00702         //cout << graph[i].x << " " << graph[i].y << " " << graph[i].z << endl;
00703         
00704         x = graph[i].x;
00705         y = graph[i].y;
00706         z = graph[i].z;
00707     }   
00708     
00709     hDegree.end();
00710     hDegreePartial.end();   
00711     hDegreeLabeled.end();
00712     
00713     ofstream out;
00714     string direcc = (parsing==SPO) ? "out" : "in";
00715     
00716     //  cout << endl << "Degree" << endl;
00717     out.open((path+"_"+direcc).c_str(), ios::out);
00718     out << "# " << direcc << " degree" << endl;
00719     hDegree.dumpStr(out);
00720     out.close();
00721     
00722     //cout << endl << "Partial degree" << endl;
00723     out.open((path+"_p"+direcc).c_str(), ios::out);
00724     out << "# Partial " << direcc << " degree" << endl;
00725     hDegreePartial.dumpStr(out);
00726     out.close();
00727     
00728     //cout << endl << "Labeled degree" << endl;
00729     out.open((path+"_l"+direcc).c_str(), ios::out);
00730     out << "# Labeled" << direcc << " degree" << endl;
00731     hDegreeLabeled.dumpStr(out);
00732     out.close();
00733     
00734 }
00735 
00736 void
00737 Triples::calculatePredicateHistogram(string path) {
00738     int npred = dictionary->getNpredicates();
00739     Histogram hPred(0, npred, npred);
00740     
00741     for(unsigned int i=0;i<graph.size();i++) {
00742         hPred.Add(graph[i].x);
00743     }
00744 
00745     ofstream out;
00746     out.open((path).c_str(), ios::out);
00747     hPred.dumpStr(out);
00748     out.close();
00749 }
00750 
00751 void
00752 Triples::calculateDegrees(string path) {
00753 
00754     cout << "Calculate OUT Degree" << endl;
00755     convertParsing(SPO);
00756     calculateDegree(path);
00757     
00758     
00759     cout << "Calculate IN Degree" << endl;
00760     convertParsing(OPS);
00761     calculateDegree(path);
00762 }
